com.samskivert.mustache

Class MustacheException.Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.samskivert.mustache.MustacheException
            • com.samskivert.mustache.MustacheException.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    MustacheException

    public static class MustacheException.Context
extends MustacheException
    An exception thrown if we encounter a context error (e.g. a missing variable) while compiling or executing a template.
    See Also:
